name: apple
trans: A round fruit that can be red, green, or yellow.

name: ball
trans: A round toy that you can throw, catch, or kick.

name: cat
trans: A small furry animal that says meow and is often kept as a pet.

name: dog
trans: An animal that barks and is often kept as a pet.

name: egg
trans: A round or oval object that comes from birds like chickens.

name: fish
trans: An animal that lives and swims in water.

name: go
trans: To move from one place to another.

name: hat
trans: Something you wear on your head.

name: ice
trans: Frozen water that is hard and cold.

name: jump
trans: To push yourself off the ground with your legs.

name: kite
trans: A toy that flies in the sky on a string.

name: lion
trans: A big wild cat with a mane that roars.

name: man
trans: An adult male person.

name: nest
trans: A home that birds make for their eggs and babies.

name: orange
trans: A round fruit that is orange in color.

name: pen
trans: A tool used for writing with ink.

name: queen
trans: A woman who rules a country or is married to a king.

name: run
trans: To move very fast on your feet.

name: sun
trans: The bright star in the sky that gives us light and warmth.

name: top
trans: The highest part of something.

name: umbrella
trans: Something you hold over your head to stay dry in the rain.

name: van
trans: A vehicle that is bigger than a car and can carry many people or things.

name: water
trans: A clear liquid that we drink and that fills rivers and oceans.

name: x-ray
trans: A special picture that shows the inside of your body, like your bones.

name: yellow
trans: A bright color like the sun or a banana.

name: zebra
trans: An animal that looks like a horse with black and white stripes.

name: book
trans: Pages with words and pictures that are held together and tell a story or give information.

name: car
trans: A vehicle with four wheels that people drive on roads.

name: door
trans: Something you open and close to go in and out of a room or building.

name: ear
trans: The part of your body that you use to hear sounds.

name: flower
trans: The pretty, colorful part of a plant.

name: girl
trans: A female child.

name: hand
trans: The part of your body at the end of your arm with five fingers.

name: ink
trans: The colored liquid used in pens for writing.

name: juice
trans: A drink made from fruit or vegetables.

name: key
trans: A small metal tool used to open locks.

name: leg
trans: The part of your body that you use to stand and walk.

name: milk
trans: A white drink that comes from cows.

name: nose
trans: The part of your face that you use to smell and breathe.

name: open
trans: To move something so you can see or go through it.

name: pig
trans: A farm animal with a curly tail that says oink.

name: quiet
trans: Making little or no noise.

name: red
trans: A color like an apple or a fire truck.

name: star
trans: A tiny light that shines in the sky at night.

name: tree
trans: A tall plant with a trunk, branches, and leaves.

name: up
trans: Moving toward a higher place.

name: voice
trans: The sound you make when you speak or sing.

name: wind
trans: Moving air that you can feel but cannot see.

name: xylophone
trans: A musical instrument with bars that you hit with small hammers to make sounds.

name: yarn
trans: Thick thread used for knitting or sewing.

name: zoo
trans: A place where wild animals are kept for people to see.

name: bag
trans: Something used to carry or hold things.

name: cup
trans: A small container used for drinking.

name: desk
trans: A table where you sit to write, read, or work.

name: eye
trans: The part of your body that you use to see.

name: frog
trans: A small animal that can jump and lives near water.

name: game
trans: Something you play for fun with rules.

name: house
trans: A building where people live.

name: island
trans: Land that is surrounded by water on all sides.

name: jam
trans: A sweet food made from fruit that you spread on bread.

name: king
trans: A man who rules a country.

name: lamp
trans: A light that you can turn on and off.

name: moon
trans: The round object that shines in the sky at night.

name: net
trans: Something made of strings with holes used to catch things.

name: ocean
trans: A very large area of salty water.

name: paper
trans: A thin, flat material used for writing or drawing.

name: quilt
trans: A warm cover for a bed made of cloth pieces sewn together.

name: road
trans: A path that cars and people use to travel.

name: shoe
trans: Something you wear on your foot.

name: table
trans: A piece of furniture with a flat top and legs.

name: under
trans: Below or beneath something.

name: vase
trans: A container used to hold flowers.

name: watch
trans: Something you wear on your wrist that tells you the time.

name: box
trans: A container with sides and sometimes a lid used to hold things.

name: yard
trans: The ground around a house where you can play.

name: zero
trans: The number that means none or nothing.

name: ant
trans: A tiny insect that lives in groups and works hard.

name: bread
trans: A food made from flour that you can eat with butter or make into sandwiches.

name: chair
trans: A piece of furniture that you sit on.

name: duck
trans: A bird that swims and says quack.

name: far
trans: A long way away.

name: good
trans: Something that is nice or done well.

name: hot
trans: Having a high temperature; very warm.

name: ill
trans: Not feeling well; sick.

name: job
trans: Work that someone does to earn money.

name: kind
trans: Nice and caring toward others.

name: long
trans: Measuring a great distance from one end to the other.

name: map
trans: A picture that shows where places are.

name: new
trans: Something that has just been made or bought.

name: old
trans: Something that has been around for a long time.

name: pet
trans: An animal that you keep at home and take care of.

name: queenly
trans: Acting like a queen; royal and graceful.

name: rain
trans: Water that falls from clouds in the sky.

name: sit
trans: To rest with your bottom on a chair or the ground.

name: toy
trans: Something that children play with.

name: use
trans: To do something with an object or tool.

name: very
trans: A word that means really or a lot.

name: warm
trans: A little bit hot; a comfortable temperature.

name: yes
trans: A word you say when you agree or say okay.

name: zip
trans: To close something quickly using a zipper.
